actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To provide for a four year demonstration project under Medicare which shall establish a preventive health care screening examination program.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover preventive health care examinations for colon and prostate cancer and osteoporosis. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish a demonstration project to test the cost-effectiveness of furnishing colon, prostate, and uterine cancer preventive screening examinations to a sample group of Medicare beneficiaries.

titles.title: To provide for a four year demonstration project under Medicare which shall establish a preventive health care screening examination program.
